thread.section_title: PlushBeds.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlushBeds.com | plushbeds.com
thread.title: Jason G - Cleveland, OH
thread.title_full: PlushBeds.com reviewed by Jason G - Cleveland, OH

author: Jason G - Cleveland, OH
title: Jason G - Cleveland, OH
text: Order a split King Cool bliss for our master bedroom. The mattresses were of a very high quality, however a little firmer that expected. Ended up needing to return these at the request of my spouse, however the return process was easily facilitated by the customer service team and a full refund was provided in a timely fashion. All in all, I would not hesitate to purchase from Plushbeds in the future.
